\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{X'} \&\& X \&\& {X'} \\
	{Y'} \&\& Y \&\& {Y'} \\
	{Z'} \&\& Z \&\& {Z'}
	\arrow["{i_X}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{a'}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{p_X}", from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["a", dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{a'}", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{i_Y}", dashed, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{b'}"', from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{p_Y}", from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["b", from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{b'}", from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{i_Z}"', from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{p_Z}"', from=3-3, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
